title: Localmax dynamics for attention in transformers and its asymptotic behavior
summary: We introduce a new discrete-time attention model, termed the localmax dynamics, which interpolates between the classic softmax dynamics and the hardmax dynamics, where only the tokens that maximize the influence toward a given token have a positive weight.
